EmailTemplate.name: Pilot Webinars.Pilot Webinars - GCC Pilot Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Honeywell Global Customer Committee (GCC) Pilot Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero?rf=107633562593387> <http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Honeywell Global Customer Committee (GCC) Pilot Webinar Honeywell Global Customer Committee (GCC) Pilot Webinar You're invited to participate in this Honeywell Aerospace Pilot Training webinar. The objective of this session is to provide the European Pilot Community an introduction to the Honeywell Global Customer Committee. We hope to show the value it can bring to pilots and how the pilot community can also help Honeywell to improve products and services. Our goal is to enable best in class end user experience in the cockpit.
Date: Thursday, December 4th, 2014 Time: 06:00 - 07:30 AM PST (GMT-8) Duration: 90 minutes Click here <https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/honeywell3/images/Honeywell Global Customer Committee %28GCC%29 Pilot Webinar.ics> to download an invitation with the link and phone number for the webinar. Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2014 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
